thread.title: Mariah Carey drops $100k month for Beverly Hills estate | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Mariah Carey drops $100k month for Beverly Hills estate | Daily Mail Online

author: Bobbie Whiteman For Dailymail.Com
title: Mariah Carey drops $100k month for Beverly Hills estate | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share That means there's both plenty of room and plenty to do for Mariah's five-year-old twins, Moroccan and Monroe, whom she shares with ex-husband Nick Cannon. If the 47-year-old decides to stay, the home can be hers for just $23 million via her realtor Emil Hartoonian Location, location: The 47-year-old singing star, seen at a party for her new single, I Don't, in West Hollywood on February 4, won't have to travel far for the myriad of LA events she attends Aerial view: The nine-bedroom, 10-bathroom Beverly Hills property includes a pool, tennis court and guest cottage Comfy spot: One of the living spaces features a fireplace, plents of room for a grand piano and windows on both sides of the room letting in lots of natural light Ready to cook up a storm: The 15,000 sq ft home has a gourmet kitchen fitted out with high end stainless steel appliances and marble counter tops on white cabinets Despite its opulence, it's actually a step down from the cliff-top mansion that she leased last year when she was with her now ex-fiancé, casino billionaire James Packer, 48. The property was located inside ultra exclusive gated community The Oaks near Kourtenay Kardashian's home in Calabasas, Los Angeles, The sprawling 18,000 sq ft property was set on an acre with dramatic views over the countryside. Just add popcorn: No need to go out to the movies as the house boasts its own theatre On a roll: A two-lane bowling alley will provide hours of fun for Mariah, her family and friends Cue up: The games room has a pool table and a view of the tennis court It featured eight bedrooms including a detached guest house with living quarters and kitchenette, plus a movie theatre, elevator, wine cellar and tasting room, personal gym and dry sauna. The couple broke up in October and Mariah is now with her 33-year-old backing dancer and choreographer, Bryan Tanaka. Meanwhile, the LEGO Batman Movie actress will next use her five-octave pipes to open for the Lionel Richie: All The Hits Tour beginning March 15 at Royal Farms Arena in Baltimore. Family fun: Mariah is sharing her new home with five-year-old twins, Moroccan and Monroe, by her ex-husband Nick Cannon. The family is seen at the Lego Batman Movie on February 4 Old digs: Mariah's new pad is actually a step down from the cliff-top mansion she leased last year in gated community The Oaks in Calabasas, Los Angeles, when she was with her now ex-fiancé, billionaire James Packer
